ygData.subject: RE: Trade of the Century..
ygData.msgSnippet: i have never been up against the negotiator.  even with a 50 MR without my song, and taking my level into account compared to hers, i was surprised Mynthi
ygData.messageBody:
i have never been up against the negotiator. even with a 50 MR without my
song, and taking my level into account compared to hers, i was surprised
Mynthi pulled it off. of course NPCs don't follow the same rules as PCs so
she got lucky i guess =) in fact i am not sure about my song, i am pretty
sure i attacked before it pulsed me to 110 MR, but i like to think it didn't
cause if she charmed me being 10 or so levels lower and with 110 MR she is
frighteningly good. i don't even know why i went after her, as she had the
lute in hand and the person i was with only wanted her for a drum. just
sitting in the tower hearing "Mynthi Davissi begins to cast a spell" over
and over i couldn't take it anymore and had to GO GET HER hehe.

Shada

>
> From: <kim@...>

> Any idea which is worse, Mynthi or the negotiator? The
> negotiator managed to charm me at level 36 while I was playing
> one magic resist song (93 resist).
